name: Project Integration Management
description: Unifies project artifacts, processes, and decisions to keep delivery coherent and aligned.

name: Project Scope Management
description: Defines exactly what is and is not included in the project to prevent scope creep.

name: Project Schedule Management
description: Plans, estimates, and controls the timeline so delivery stays predictable.

name: Project Cost Management
description: Plans, estimates, budgets, and controls costs to complete the project within the approved budget.

name: Project Quality Management
description: Translates the organization's quality policy into deliverables that meet requirements and fit-for-use standards.

name: Project Resource Management
description: Identifies, acquires, and manages the physical and team resources needed for successful completion.

name: Project Communications Management
description: Ensures timely and appropriate generation, distribution, and monitoring of project information.

name: Project Risk Management
description: Identifies, analyzes, and responds to risk factors throughout the life of the project.

name: Project Procurement Management
description: Manages the purchasing or acquiring of products, services, or results from outside the project team.

name: Project Stakeholder Management
description: Identifies people impacted by the project and develops strategies to engage them effectively.
